name: Prolific Cloud
about: Prolific Cloud is a comprehensive solution for small to medium size businesses looking to establish or enhance their online presence. With its user-friendly interface, it allows you to easily create, design, and develop a professional website that will help you stand out from the competition.
features: This app is basically CMS-based and page builder type app
There have some pre build templates which you can customize.
Also there have custom domain facilities for your applications.
Here implements advanced SEO features.
Here use website navigator.
For live chat, used tawk.to.

features: This is a toy eCommerce website where you can find varieties of closets and buy them.
In this project used JWT authentication system for login and registration as well as google login system is there.
You can see the flash sale for today feature.
It is a multi-vendor type e-commerce website.

name: Mobile Reseller application
about: Mobile seller here for you , we are making the seller and buyer life easier by our service please choice the best phone for you from below categories.
features: This is a React+Vite web application.
You can buy a mobile from the featured phone cart as a buyer mood.
You can also sell a mobile as a seller mood.
Admin can handle allover thinks like order, buyer and seller operation from admin panel.
There have 3 types of phone category - Budget, Mid Range, Flagship and Flagship Killer.
For more information, Visit the project repository.

name: FNS24-News Portal
about: FNS24 is a news portal application here daily news are published from the admin side and viewer can see daily updates.
features: This is a React+Vite web application.
As it is a news portal application, viewer can see everyday updates via this web application
Pixel perfect site with responsive
It was an order project

name: Pondit
about: Pondit is course selling for technology students. It is basically Edu-tech site. There have also include all the mentors who takes the course classes and guide the students.
features: This is a Vue+Vite web application.
It is an Edu-tech web application.

name: ACS Doubts by Ronon
about: This website is designed for HSC candidate for their subject wise problem solving. The students can post their problems as a picture. Then the solver solve the problem and get a commission for the solution.
features: This is a Vue+Vite web application.
It is an Educational web application.
There have 3 types of role access methods - Student, Solver and administrator.
Student enroll a package at their need and then a student can access to post his/her problem through the channel to solve the problem.
The solver waiting for the problem, the try to solve the problem. If a solver solve a problem his/her account add the commission.
Whole operation managed by several administrators.
